description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSecret Ingredient:
At the start of battle, your {RACE_Dumpling}s gain Current and Maximum {STAT_health} equal to 15% of all your {RACE_Dumpling}s' Maximum {STAT_health}. This trait does not stack.
name: Raw Dough Ball
